city.fieldDescription: Specify city property for the destination page.
city.name: ./city

rank.fieldDescription: Rank the city so that cities list is sorted by rank
rank.name: ./rank

bestForTags.fieldDescription: Select what this City is best suitable for
bestForTags.name: ./bestForTags

featuredImage.fieldDescription: Select an Image to be used as Featured image for this Page
featuredImage.name: ./featuredImage

preview-image.fieldDescription: Select an image to be used as a preview image
preview-image.name: ./previewImage

image.fieldDescription: Select an image to be used as a location image
image.name: ./image

copy.fieldDescription: Caption text to display over the image
copy.name: ./imageCaption/copy

link.fieldDescription: Link that will be opened when Learn More is clicked
link.name: ./imageCaption/link

latitude.fieldDescription: Enter Latitude GPS coordinate for this location
latitude.name: ./latitude

longitude.fieldDescription: Enter Longitude GPS coordinate for this location
longitude.name: ./longitude

detail-items.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new Location Detail

image.fieldDescription: Select an image to be used as a Location Detail image
image.name: ./image

recommendation-items.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new Location recommendation

iconlink.fieldDescription: Select the icon image path for recommendation
iconlink.name: ./iconLink

links.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new link

externalMode.fieldDescription: Mode where external link should be opened
externalMode.name: ./externalMode

tags.fieldDescription: Select what this City is related to
tags.name: ./related/tags

nearest-city-items.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new near by area

column.jcr:title: Area as per nearest location first order

aroundcity.fieldDescription: Select area as per nearest place to the city first order.
aroundcity.name: ./area

promote.fieldDescription: Check this if city card needs to be displayed on event details page
promote.name: ./isPromote

tab-items.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add tabs in Area Details

tab-content-type.fieldDescription: Based on Selection of article content type the layout will change
tab-content-type.name: ./type

article-path.fieldDescription: Configure the Path where the article content to be picked from
article-path.name: ./articlePath

photoGallery.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new photo
